data.name: Outrace
data.detailed_description:
The 80s called. They want their vibe back.
Inspired by early arcade racers, Outrace brings the genre back to life with a vibrant colour palette and synthwave soundtrack.

Forget about the Cold War and unwind with a selection of iconic cars and a variety of exotic tracks.
Play arcade mode to relive the classic Outrun excitement of racing against the clock, or turn off the timer and enjoy a retro drive at your own pace.
Unlock the fastest vehicles and most exotic track locations by performing well on the racetrack.

Earn achievements for completing stages and setting record times.
Compete against the best Outrunners with top scores posted on worldwide leaderboards.

Outrace is more than a game. It's a whole atmosphere.
So what are you waiting for? Racers, start your engines!

data.short_description: Outrace revives the pseudo-3D racing genre with a vibrant colour palette and synthwave soundtrack.Enjoy the iconic sights, sounds, tracks and cars of the arcade age.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
